title: Very Nice T202 Including Mathewson McGraw Brown ++
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: Very Nice T202 Including Mathewson McGraw Brown ++
posts.post_content:
The Pinch Hitter Hoblitzel/Egan - Stunning front, amazing sharp corners. Typical crease just next to fold line on Egan side. SOLD

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains025/Hoblitzell_zps28f2403f.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains025/HoblitzellBack_zpse3a76b4f.jpg[/IMG]

Just Before The Battle Mathewson/Meyers - Tiny surface wrinkle by McGraw's head in middle section. Area of paper separation at back (not paper loss). Amazing corners. SOLD

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains025/MattyFront_zpsca2c0fdb.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains025/MattyBack_zps5797e7ed.jpg[/IMG]

The Athletic Infield Brown/Graham - Light surface wrinkle middle section 1 inch long.  Amazing corners. SOLD

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains025/BrownFront_zps2ad275fe.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains025/BrownBack_zps189e420a.jpg[/IMG]

Just Before The Battle McGraw/Jennings - Typical fold line just next to crease on Jennings side. Unbelievable otherwise. SOLD

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains025/MugsyFront_zps8fffd85e.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains025/MugsyBack_zps034b9d46.jpg[/IMG]

Held At Third Tannehill/Lord - Gorgeous front and back. Just tiny back issue above N in Hassan. SOLD

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains025/TannehillFront_zps6a328099.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains025/TannehillBack_zps29ff8592.jpg[/IMG]

Evers Makes A Safe Slide Reulbach/Archer - Light surface wrinkle top middle of center part. Otherwise flawless. $125

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains025/ReulbachFront_zpsaccc53a7.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains025/ReulbachBack_zpsa70905d2.jpg[/IMG]

More to come...

Tom C
